text: it's in New York between the holidays
and the surprise to me are very pleasant
were all the clothes from platinum to
sylva bright silver and some of them
even shaded into a silvery pearl beige
and it kind of caught my eye that the
holiday decorations the wonderful big
silvery star on the cop top of the
rockefeller tree the silver base in the
window of Bergdorf Goodman's with a
monkey patty monkey playing it and I
thought how well he went with the monkey
that a man was walking in a harness on
the street and a lady with a great
silvery gray lace hemmed net dress
stooped down to pet him and at that
moment the monkey jumped up and
unfortunately his Neoga caught in the
hem of the lace dress but it was
wonderful you know everyone took it with
pleasure and surprise and of course the
colors of chinchilla and close with the
striping of all the shades of silver to
dark gray and I like very much the woman
who had a very plain a bag shape knitted
hat and then she put a silver star pin
on it you know nothing like giving it a
pizzazz by just putting a big jewel on
her on a plane hat that you brought off
the street from a pushcart you know in
the case of a trim it just looked great
you'll just have fun with it and I wish
you all a very happy new year and will
hopefully find lots of intriguing things
next year on this
you
